casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-2162. Bellman v. Am. Internatl. Group.

Lucas App. No. L-03-1301, 163 Ohio App.3d 540, 2005-Ohio-5250. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Lucas County. Upon consideration of the motion for admission pro hac vice of Alan S. Gilbert by Rodger L. Eekleberry,

It is ordered by the court that the motion for admission pro hac vice is granted.
